mapper.insert: INSERT INTO verification_code (email, code, type, expire_time, is_used, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{email}, #{code}, #{type}, #{expireTime}, #{isUsed}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: SELECT id, email, code, type, expire_time, is_used, create_time, update_time FROM verification_code WHERE email = #{email} AND type = #{type} ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT id, email, code, type, expire_time, is_used, create_time, update_time FROM verification_code WHERE email = #{email} AND type = #{type} AND is_used = 0 AND expire_time > NOW() ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT id, email, code, type, expire_time, is_used, create_time, update_time FROM verification_code WHERE email = #{email} AND is_used = 0 ORDER BY create_time DESC
